languages.text: Татуированная мумия с выжженной аквилой на лбу и в странных меховых одеждах покоится в ритуальной позе.
The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in bizarre fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.
languages.original_text: Татуированная мумия с выжженной аквилой на лбу и в странных меховых одеждах покоится в ритуальной позе.

traits.locale_text: The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in strange fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.
The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in strange fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.

The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in bizarre fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.

languages.text: 这具干尸身上纹着纹身，以某种仪式性的姿势躺在这里。干尸穿着古怪的毛皮服装，额头上烙着双头鹰印记。
languages.original_text: The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in bizarre fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.

traits.locale_text: 这具干尸身上纹着纹身，以某种仪式性的姿势躺在这里。干尸穿着古怪的毛皮服装，额头上烙着双头鹰印记。

languages.text: Die tätowierte Mumie liegt in einer zeremoniellen Pose da. Sie ist in bizarre Felle gekleidet und ihr wurde ein Aquila in die Stirn gebrannt.
languages.original_text: The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in bizarre fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.

traits.locale_text: Die tätowierte Mumie liegt in einer zeremoniellen Pose da. Sie ist in bizarre Felle gekleidet und ihr wurde ein Aquila in die Stirn gebrannt.

languages.text: La momia tatuada yace en una postura ceremonial; está ataviada con un extraño atuendo de pieles animales y tiene el símbolo del Aquila grabado a fuego en la frente.
languages.original_text: The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in bizarre fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.

traits.locale_text: La momia tatuada yace en una postura ceremonial; está ataviada con un extraño atuendo de pieles animales y tiene el símbolo del Aquila grabado a fuego en la frente.

languages.text: La momie tatouée est allongée de façon cérémonielle, vêtue d'un étrange habit de fourrure. Un Aquila a été gravé au fer rouge sur son front.
languages.original_text: The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in bizarre fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.

traits.locale_text: La momie tatouée est allongée de façon cérémonielle, vêtue d'un étrange habit de fourrure. Un Aquila a été gravé au fer rouge sur son front.

languages.text: 刺青をしたミイラは儀式のポーズをとり、奇妙な毛皮の衣装を身にまとい、その額にアクィラが焼き付いている。
languages.original_text: The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in bizarre fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.

traits.locale_text: 刺青をしたミイラは儀式のポーズをとり、奇妙な毛皮の衣装を身にまとい、その額にアクィラが焼き付いている。

languages.text: Tuhaf bir kürklü kıyafet kuşanmış ve alnına Çift Başlı Kartal simgesi dağlanmış dövmeli mumya, törensel bir konumda uzanıyor.
languages.original_text: The tattooed mummy lies in a ceremonial pose, dressed in bizarre fur attire and with an Aquila burned into its forehead.

traits.locale_text: Tuhaf bir kürklü kıyafet kuşanmış ve alnına Çift Başlı Kartal simgesi dağlanmış dövmeli mumya, törensel bir konumda uzanıyor.
